title: Consumer inflation in Japan's capital perks up, Ukraine crisis to add pressure
description: Consumer inflation in Japan's capital accelerated in February at the fastest annual pace in more than two years, suggesting that soaring fuel and food costs will weigh on consumption and the country's fragile economic recovery.
